Basic.name: Blessing of Kings
Basic.flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

Basic.name: Chillwind Yeti
Basic.flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

Basic.name: Consecration
Basic.flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

Basic.name: Dragonling Mechanic
Basic.flavor: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

Basic.name: Fireball
Basic.flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

Basic.name: Gnomish Inventor
Basic.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

Basic.name: Hammer of Wrath
Basic.flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

Basic.name: Hellfire
Basic.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

Basic.name: Houndmaster
Basic.flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

Basic.name: Kor'kron Elite
Basic.flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

Basic.name: Multi-Shot
Basic.text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
Basic.flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

Basic.name: Oasis Snapjaw
Basic.flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

Basic.name: Ogre Magi
Basic.flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

Basic.name: Polymorph
Basic.text: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.
Basic.flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

Basic.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
Basic.flavor: Sen'jin Villiage is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

Basic.name: Stormwind Knight
Basic.flavor: They're still embarassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

Basic.name: Swipe
Basic.text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.
Basic.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

Basic.name: Truesilver Champion
Basic.text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
Basic.flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

Basic.name: Water Elemental
Basic.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
Basic.flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

Basic.name: Windspeaker
Basic.flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

Classic.name: Ancient Brewmaster
Classic.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
Classic.flavor: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that's a compliment.

Classic.name: Ancient Mage
Classic.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Spell Damage +1.
Classic.flavor: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

Classic.name: Arathi Weaponsmith
Classic.text: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2 weapon.
Classic.flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

Classic.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
Classic.text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
Classic.flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

Classic.name: Bite
Classic.text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn and 4 Armor.
Classic.flavor: Chew your food!

Classic.name: Blade Flurry
Classic.text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
Classic.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

Classic.name: Cone of Cold
Classic.text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
Classic.flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

Classic.name: Cult Master
Classic.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, draw a card.
Classic.flavor: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

Classic.name: Dark Iron Dwarf
Classic.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
Classic.flavor: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

Classic.name: Defender of Argus
Classic.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
Classic.flavor: You wouldnâ€™t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

Classic.name: Dread Corsair
Classic.text: Taunt. Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
Classic.flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

Classic.name: Ethereal Arcanist
Classic.text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
Classic.flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

Classic.name: Keeper of the Grove
Classic.text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
Classic.flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

Classic.name: Lightspawn
Classic.text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
Classic.flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

Classic.name: Mass Dispel
Classic.text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
Classic.flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

Classic.name: Master of Disguise
Classic.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
Classic.flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

Classic.name: Mindgames
Classic.text: Put a copy of a random minion from your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
Classic.flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

Classic.name: Mogu'shan Warden
Classic.text: Taunt
Classic.flavor: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

Classic.name: Mortal Strike
Classic.text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
Classic.flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

Classic.name: Pit Lord
Classic.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
Classic.flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

Classic.name: Shadow Madness
Classic.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
Classic.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

Classic.name: Shadowflame
Classic.text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
Classic.flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

Classic.name: Silvermoon Guardian
Classic.text: Divine Shield
Classic.flavor: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didnâ€™t go so wellâ€¦

Classic.name: Soul of the Forest
Classic.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
Classic.flavor: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

Classic.name: Spellbreaker
Classic.text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
Classic.flavor: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

Classic.name: Summoning Portal
Classic.text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
Classic.flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

Classic.name: Twilight Drake
Classic.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
Classic.flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

Classic.name: Violet Teacher
Classic.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
Classic.flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

Promo.name: I Am Murloc
Promo.text: Summon three, four, or five 1/1 Murlocs.

Reward.name: Old Murk-Eye
Reward.text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
Reward.flavor: He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.
Reward.howToGet: Unlocked when you have all the Murlocs from the Classic Set.
Reward.howToGetGold: Unlocked when you have all the Golden Murlocs from the Expert and Basic Sets.

Naxxramas.name: Anub'ar Ambusher
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
Naxxramas.flavor: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Baron Rivendare
Naxxramas.flavor: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Death's Bite
Naxxramas.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Deathbloom
Naxxramas.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Summon a Spore.

Naxxramas.name: Necroknight
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Destroy the minions next to this one as well.

Naxxramas.name: Poison Seeds
Naxxramas.text: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
Naxxramas.flavor: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Voidcaller
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Wailing Soul
Naxxramas.flavor: This soul just wails on you. Dang, soul, let up already.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Ancestor's Call
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "Hey! Ancestors!" - Ancestor's call

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Arcane Nullifier X-21
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: There was some hard talk between gnome magi and engineers about inventing this mech.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Burly Rockjaw Trogg
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +2 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He's burly because he does CrossFit.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Dunemaul Shaman
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Windfury, Overload: (1) 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Echo of Medivh
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Enhance-o Mechano
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions Windfury, Taunt, or Divine Shield. (at random)
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: His enhancements are gluten free!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Fel Cannon
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a non-Mech minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Goblin Blastmage
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Imp-losion
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal $2-$4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Jeeves
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the end of each player's turn, that player draws until they have 3 cards.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: This robot is a lean, mean, butlerin' machine.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Kezan Mystic
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Take control of a random enemy Secret.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: They pretend to be wise and enlightened, but they mostly just hate to be left out of a secret.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Lost Tallstrider
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The message, "If found, please return to Mulgore," is tattooed on his rear.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mechanical Yeti
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The yetis of Chillwind Point are a source of both inspiration and savage beatings.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mini-Mage
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He is sometimes found hiding in the treasure chest in the Gurubashi Arena.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Piloted Shredder
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Sabotage
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Combo: And your opponent's weapon.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Rogues can't stand it. They know you planned it! They are going to set you straight!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Screwjank Clunker
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever another friendly Murloc dies, draw a card. Overload: (1)
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Give your weapon +3 Attack. Combo: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Wee Spellstopper
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Adjacent minions can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Axe Flinger
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Core Rager
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Dismount
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Summon Gyth. Get a new Hero Power.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Dismount
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Summon Gyth. Get a new Hero Power.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain +1/+1.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Fireguard Destroyer
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Hungry Dragon
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Hungry Hungry Dragon is NOT a fun game.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Living Bomb
Blackrock Mountain.text: Choose an enemy minion. If it lives until your next turn, deal $5 damage to all enemies.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Sonic Breath
Blackrock Mountain.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Give your weapon +3 Attack.

Blackrock Mountain.name: TIME FOR SMASH
Blackrock Mountain.text: Deal $5 damage to a random enemy. Gain 5 Armor.

The Grand Tournament.name: Armored Warhorse
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.

The Grand Tournament.name: Astral Communion
The Grand Tournament.text: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?

The Grand Tournament.name: Charged Hammer
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

The Grand Tournament.name: Crowd Favorite
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The crowd ALWAYS yells lethal.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dalaran Aspirant
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

The Grand Tournament.name: Draenei Totemcarver
The Grand Tournament.flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dreadsteed
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

The Grand Tournament.name: Evil Heckler
The Grand Tournament.flavor: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

The Grand Tournament.name: Fist of Jaraxxus
The Grand Tournament.text: When you play or discard this, deal $4 damage to a random enemy.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: * Not actually Jaraxxus' fist.

The Grand Tournament.name: Frigid Snobold
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

The Grand Tournament.name: Gormok the Impaler
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

The Grand Tournament.name: Holy Champion
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

The Grand Tournament.name: Magnataur Alpha
The Grand Tournament.text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
he attacks.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

The Grand Tournament.name: Maiden of the Lake
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Not a good basis for a system of government.

The Grand Tournament.name: Murloc Knight
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

The Grand Tournament.name: Poisoned Blade
The Grand Tournament.text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

The Grand Tournament.name: Refreshment Vendor
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

The Grand Tournament.name: Savage Combatant
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Maybe if you whistle a tune it will soothe him.  Yeah...  Try that.

The Grand Tournament.name: Spawn of Shadows
The Grand Tournament.flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

The Grand Tournament.name: Tournament Medic
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

The Grand Tournament.name: Twilight Guardian
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

The Grand Tournament.name: Wildwalker
The Grand Tournament.flavor: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

The League of Explorers.name: Ancient Shade
The League of Explorers.text: Battlecry: Shuffle an 'Ancient Curse' into your deck that deals 7 damage to you when drawn.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Warning: Do not expose to direct sunlight.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Animated Armor
The League of Explorers.text: Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Try putting it on.  Wait, let me get my camera.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Eerie Statue
The League of Explorers.text: Canâ€™t attack unless itâ€™s the only minion in the battlefield.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Don't blink!  Don't turn your back, don't look away, and DON'T BLINK.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Elise Starseeker
The League of Explorers.text: Battlecry: Shuffle the 'Map to the Golden Monkey' into your deck.
The League of Explorers.flavor: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Golden Monkey
The League of Explorers.text: Taunt Battlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.

The League of Explorers.name: Gorillabot A-3
The League of Explorers.text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, Discover a Mech.
The League of Explorers.flavor: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Jungle Moonkin
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Keeper of Uldaman
The League of Explorers.text: Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
The League of Explorers.flavor: U da man!  No, U da man!
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Rolling Boulder
The League of Explorers.text: At the end of your turn, destroy the minion to the left.

The League of Explorers.name: Rumbling Elemental
The League of Explorers.text: After you play a Battlecry minion, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Tomb Pillager
The League of Explorers.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
The League of Explorers.flavor: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Tomb Spider
The League of Explorers.flavor: Less serious than its cousin, the Grave Spider.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Aberrant Berserker
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Enrage: +2 Attack.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: I berserk, therefore I am.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Blackwater Pirate
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Your weapons cost (2) less.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: "Look, they fell off the back of a ship, do you want them or not? I have a meeting with Y'Shaarj in like ten minutes."

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Bloodhoof Brave
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Taunt Enrage: +3 Attack.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: C'Thun's Chosen
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: He gave her a promise ring and everything.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Cyclopian Horror
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each enemy minion.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: What are the qualifications for being a 'Horror?'  Just how horrible do you have to be?

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Demented Frostcaller
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Eater of Secrets
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets. Gain +1/+1 for each.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: You don't want to be around after it has eaten an explosive trap.  You thought Sludge Belcher was bad...

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Evolved Kobold
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Spell Damage +2
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: You no take tentacle!

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Faceless Shambler
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Taunt Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Attack and Health.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: "What is that thing?!" "I'm not sure, but it seems to be sort of Y'sera shaped."

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Fandral Staghelm
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Your Choose One cards have both effects combined.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Treeâ€¦" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Flamewreathed Faceless
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Overload: (2)
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: He's on fire! Boomshakalaka!

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Hooded Acolyte
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Whenever a character is healed, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Infested Tauren
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Slime.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Infested Wolf
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Master of Evolution
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Will be really useful in the new "HearthÃ©mon" game.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Midnight Drake
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other card in your hand.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Still fearsome in the daytime.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Mire Keeper
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: [x]Choose One -Summon a 2/2 Slime; or Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor:
"Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?" 
"No.  I'm keeping it."

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Polluted Hoarder
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Roll â€˜greedâ€™ OR THIS COULD HAPPEN TO YOU.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Shadow Word: Horror
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Shifting Shade
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Southsea Squidface
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deathrattle: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Twilight Summoner
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Faceless Destroyer.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: If you strike him down, he shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

Karazhan.name: Arcanosmith
Karazhan.flavor: Heâ€™s really just a Blacksmith, but he thought the fancy title would bring in more business.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Barnes
Karazhan.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of a random minion in your deck.
Karazhan.flavor: He used to play every part, until Moroes confiscated his Orb of Deception.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Dorothee

all enemy minions to 1.

Whenever you cast a spell, restore 3 Health to
your hero.

Karazhan.name: Shadow Volley

2-Cost minion.

Karazhan.name: Steal Life

Karazhan.name: True Love
Karazhan.text: Hero Power If you don't have Romulo, summon him.

Karazhan.flavor: You can easily defeat her by either dealing 4 damage, or dropping a house on her.
